response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense worth to me. This exceptional item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $650,000. This is a significant discount compared to its true value, which I believe you will find compelling. I trust that you will appreciate its worth and make a decision that aligns with your interests and needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 650000}
